MINUTE entry before the Honorable Matthew F. Kennelly: Status hearing held on 11/2/2017. A Word version of the proposed amendment to consent decree and a draft order compelling compliance with the updated plan to be submitted to Judge Kennelly's proposed order email address. The deadline for all expert reports is extended to 12/7/2017. The deadline for the joint status report is extended to 1/19/2018. Status hearing set for 1/29/2018 at 9:30 a.m. Mailed notice. (pjg, )

MINUTE entry before the Honorable Matthew F. Kennelly: Motion to enforce [202] is terminated. (mk)

MINUTE entry before the Honorable Matthew F. Kennelly: Rule 16(b) status hearing held on 9/25/2017 with attorneys for both sides. Proposal on consent decree modifications concerning notice of referral of youth for prosecuting is to be submitted by 11/6/2017. A further joint or separate filings regarding DJJ's "plan to address youth prosecutions" [dkt. 214] is to be filed by 10/31/2017. Motion to enforce [206] is withdrawn without prejudice as stated in plaintiff's statement on prohibitory relief [219]. Status hearing is set for 11/2/2017 at 9:30 a.m. This will be an in-person status hearing. Mailed notice. (pjg, )
STATEMENT by M. D., D. F., D. G., R. J., B. W. on Request for Prohibitory Relief (Bennett, Camille)

MINUTE entry before the Honorable Matthew F. Kennelly: Rule 16(b) status hearing held on 9/19/2017 with attorneys for both sides. Telephone status hearing, to be initiated by the parties, is set for 9/25/2017 at 8:45 a.m. Plaintiffs are to file by 9/22/2017 a statement regarding whether they wish to pursue to prohibitory relief sought in their motion to enforce. Mailed notice. (pjg, )
RESPONSE by Plaintiffs M. D., D. F., D. G., R. J., B. W. to other, [214] Plaintiffs' Response to DJJ's Plan to Address Youth Prosecutions in Saline County (Bennett, Camille)

MINUTE entry before the Honorable Matthew F. Kennelly: The case is set for a conference in chambers (Room 2188) on 9/19/2017 at 8:30 AM to discuss further proceedings on plaintiffs' motion to enforce and the DJJ's proposed plan (dkt. no. 214). Plaintiffs are directed to file a response to the proposed plan by the close of business on 9/18/2017. (mk)

MINUTE entry before the Honorable Matthew F. Kennelly: Telephone status hearing held with attorneys for both sides. The Court is considering a site visit to IYC Harrisburg on 9/12/2017. The recent status report was also discussed. Telephone status hearing, to be initiated by the parties, is set for 8/22/2017 at 8:45 a.m. Mailed notice. (pjg, )

MINUTE entry before the Honorable Matthew F. Kennelly: Motion hearing held on 8/14/2017. Motion to enforce [202] is taken under advisement. Plaintiff is directed to negotiate a modification to the consent decree that requires the disclosures of referrals for delinquency or criminal prosecutions. A proposed plan as discussed in open court to be submitted by 8/25/2017. The 8/16/2017 status hearing is vacated. Telephone status hearing, to be initiated by the parties, is set for 8/17/2017 at 8:30 a.m. Mailed notice. (pjg, )
STATUS Report by Candice Jones (Dierkes, Michael)

MINUTE entry before the Honorable Matthew F. Kennelly: The argument and ruling set for 8/16/2017 is advanced, at the Court's instance, to 8/14/2017 at 9:30 AM. Judge Kennelly will be on trial for two weeks starting on 8/15/2017 and wishes to deal with the pending motion in this case before that, if possible. Counsel are advised that the Court is likely to have questions concerning the motion. (mk)

MINUTE entry before the Honorable Matthew F. Kennelly: Motion for leave to file exhibits under seal [201] is granted. A complete copy of plaintiffs' filing, including the motion and exhibits, is to be filed under seal so that the Court can download it as a single docket entry, and the required chambers hard copy must likewise be a complete version. Defendant is directed to respond to the motion by no later than 8/1/2017. Plaintiffs may file a reply by no later than 8/8/2017. Ruling is set for 8/16/2017 at 9:30 AM. (mk)

MINUTE entry before the Honorable Matthew F. Kennelly: Status hearing held on 12/19/2016. Defendant is to file a status report detailing its position with respect to compliance and plans for compliance with each requirement of the consent decree, as more fully explained in open court, by 1/20/2017. A consent decree monitoring meeting to be held at the IYC St. Charles facility is set for 2/3/2017 at 10:00 a.m. The court-appointed monitors are to be present at this meeting. Telephone status hearing is set for 1/31/2017 at 9:00 a.m. Mailed notice. (pjg, )
